dialog.teller: Blue sky in the top 25%, a low mountain in between

dialog.drawer: I don't have any control over the color. I just pick Grass and then  brush size.

dialog.teller: Got it. Last one was better. If you can get less sky and more mountain (or hill), great. Otherwise go back and let's submit this thing.

dialog.drawer: Okay. Sorry, my options are limited for the green background. I can do grass, trees, or bushes. They all look like the mountain.
